chapters.title: Chapter 10:  A Village in Shiota
chapters.info:
Birgitte Trahelion,
      p. 261â€”Captain-General of the Queen's Guards under
      Elayne, and her Warder.  She tells everyone she is
      from Kandor.  However she is actually the Birgitte,
      a Hero of Legend, bound to the Horn of Valere until
      Moghedien ripped her away.
      See
